BILL.TITLE: Security of electricity supply and infrastructure investment

DEBATE-SPEECH.TEXT: The next item is the report by Giles Chichester, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, on the proposal for a directive of the European Parliament and of the Council concerning measures to safeguard security of electricity supply and infrastructure investment (COM(2003)0740 – C5-0643/2003 – 2003/0301(COD)) ( A6-0099/2005 ).
